txt.en: 'Parth Celebrant is where the worst of the fighting took place five hundred years ago, when Eorl rode out of the north to come to the aid of Gondor.\n\n'Cerdic is one of the scouts stationed in Parth Celebrant, and he has spent many months combing the battlefield for relics of the past. He is a nervous man, better with artifacts than with people. You will see this when you meet him.'
